Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or confirmation from credible sources to support the assertion that the animated show Darkwing Duck will return to television in 2018.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the information published by Nerd Reactor on April Fool's Day in 2015 was accurate, leading to the belief that Darkwing Duck would return in 2018. However, this assumption was later proven to be false.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that as of January 2016, Disney had not announced any plans to revive the Darkwing Duck television show.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the possibility of Darkwing Duck returning to television by presenting it as a definite occurrence in 2018, without sufficient evidence to support this claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not thoroughly investigating the credibility of the sources and failing to verify the accuracy of the information before making the assertion about Darkwing Duck's return.
